main event: A civilian witness in Honolulu, Hawaii observed a bright light in the sky on December 7, 1967.
interesting points: The light kept changing colors from white to red at approximately 1-second intervals.
The object was moving in an ESE direction and disappeared behind the St. Louis Heights hills.
The observation lasted for about 90 seconds.
The witness was an artist who had taught art at the University of Hawaii and written as an art critic for local newspapers.
The witness reported the sighting to the case field for the Honolulu, Hawaii Project Blue Book case on December 6, 1967.
sighted object: A bright light in the sky, changing color from white to red
